data.feedback: The diagram is highly complete and accurate, illustrating asymmetric key cryptography with all required components and relationships clearly represented and well-organized, although there is a minor redundancy in depicting the encrypted message input to the decryption process.
refinement_instructions: Consolidate the two arrows from 'Encrypted Message (Ciphertext)' to 'Decryption Process' (ids 21 and 23) into a single arrow with a descriptive label like 'sends Encrypted Message as input' to avoid redundancy.
